text: Fourteen cases of FPL from Dubai , UAE , were diagnosed in domestic crossbreds with positive faecal CPV antigen test results . All cats were strays or strays that had been recently adopted , and all were unvaccinated , except an 18 - month - old cat that had received a primary course of kitten vaccinations and a booster vaccination at 12 months . Clinical signs included vomiting , diarrhoea and lethargy , and the median age at diagnosis was 4 months ( range 1 - 18 months ) . All cats were treated , and outcomes were known in 12 cases , of which 8 died or were euthanised , and 4 survived .
